title: Written in the Stars
description: In WRITTEN IN THE STARS (Stars Trilogy Book 3-Conclusion), Celine finds out that being with a megastar is not the super-fab life she has been fantasizing about for years. Fame has its price and she is paying it with Dare big time. Being in a high-profile relationship with the biggest celebrity in Hollywood makes her the target of the vicious paparazzi, as well. Add the fact that two of Dare's exes are trying to make a major comeback in his life, Celine is wondering now if she has what it takes to be Mrs. Montgomery for real. Dare, on the other hand is dealing with some unfinished business in his past and he must put an end to it all in order to have a shot at real happiness.
author: Eve Montelibano
